'''Grace of Royal Roads''' is [[Kaveh]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* Grace of Royal Roads references the {{w|Royal Road}}, an ancient highway reconstructed by Persian king Darius the Great spanning between the cities of Susa and Sardis.
